alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; South Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 10:37PM MST until January 12 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...South Central Highlands and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust are possible across Chaves County and may reduce visibility to 3 miles or less at times.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; South Central Highlands
